mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( id, username, PASSWORD, phone, email, created, updated ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{created}, #{updated} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.username, a.password, a.phone, a.email, a.created, a.updated FROM tb_user AS a WHERE a.id = #{id}
